## R Markdown




```{r}
library(tidyverse)

sushi10 <- read_csv("../sushi3-2016/sushi10.csv", col_names = TRUE)

sushi10_rank <- sushi10 %>% 
  mutate(sushi = str_remove_all(`10 1`, "0 10") %>% trimws()) %>% 
  select(-`10 1`) %>% 
  separate(sushi, 
           into = c("1st", "2nd", "3rd", "4th", "5th", 
                    "6th", "7th", "8th", "9th", "10th"),
           by = " ") 


# ex. first respondent: placed 5 == Ikura as 1st Favorite!
sushi_names <- c("Ebi 0", "Anago 1", "Maguro 2", "Ika 3", "Uni 4", 
                 "Ikura 5", "Tamago 6", "Toro 7", "Tekkamaki 8", "Kappamaki 9")



```
